verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Very Great The <S%G3827><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Being, <S%G5607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> They May Eat, <S%G5315><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%>

I Am Moved With Compassion <S%G4697><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> They Continue <S%G4357><s%> With Me <S%G3427><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Not <S%G2192><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> They May Eat; <S%G5315><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I Shall Send Away <S%G630><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Fasting <S%G3523><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3624><s%> Their Home, <S%G846><s%> They Will Faint <S%G1590><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way; <S%G3598><s%> <S%G5100><s%> For Some <S%G1063><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> From Afar <S%G3113><s%> Are Come. <S%G2240><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> Whence <S%G4159><s%> These <S%G5128><s%> Shall Be Able <S%G1410><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> To Satisfy <S%G5526><s%> <S%G740><s%> ' With Bread <S%G1909><s%> In A Desert? <S%G2047><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Asked <S%G1905><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> How Many <S%G4214><s%> Have Ye <S%G2192><s%> Loaves? <S%G740><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Ordered <S%G3853><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> To Recline <S%G377><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground. <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Loaves, <S%G740><s%> Having Given Thanks <S%G2168><s%> He Broke <S%G2806><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Set Before Them. <S%G3908><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Set It Before <S%G3908><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd. <S%G3793><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Had <S%G2192><s%> Small Fishes <S%G2485><s%> A Few; <S%G3641><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Blessed <S%G2127><s%> He Desired <S%G2036><s%> To Be Set Before Them <S%G3908><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> These. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5315><s%> , And They Ate <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Satisfied. <S%G5526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Took Up <S%G142><s%> Over And Above <S%G4051><s%> Of Fragments <S%G2801><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Baskets. <S%G4711><s%>
<S%G2258><s%> And Were <S%G1161><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Eaten <S%G5315><s%> About <S%G5613><s%> Four Thousand; <S%G5070><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Sent Away <S%G630><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Having Entered <S%G1684><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> He Came <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parts <S%G3313><s%> Of Dalmanutha. <S%G1148><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Dispute With <S%G4802><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Seeking <S%G2212><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Tempting <S%G3985><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Groaned <S%G389><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> In His Spirit <S%G846><s%> He Says, <S%G3004><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1074><s%> This Generation <S%G3778><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> Seeks? <S%G1934><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5213><s%> To You, <S%G1487><s%> If There Shall Be Given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1074><s%> To This Generation <S%G3778><s%> A Sign. <S%G4592><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Left <S%G863><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Entered <S%G1684><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> He Went Away <S%G565><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side. <S%G4008><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Forgot <S%G1950><s%> To Take <S%G2983><s%> Loaves, <S%G740><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Loaf <S%G740><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Had Not Any <S%G2192><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them <S%G1438><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship. <S%G4143><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Charged <S%G1291><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> See, <S%G3708><s%> Take Heed <S%G991><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leaven <S%G2219><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Leaven <S%G2219><s%> Of Herod. <S%G2264><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> They Reasoned <S%G1260><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> We Have. <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Knowing It <S%G1097><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Reason Ye <S%G1260><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2192><s%> Ye Have? <S%G3768><s%> Do Ye Not Yet Perceive <S%G3539><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Understand? <S%G4920><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> Hardened <S%G4456><s%> Have Ye <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Heart? <S%G5216><s%>

Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Having, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Ye Not See? <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> Having, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Ye Not Hear? <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Ye Not Remember? <S%G3421><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> I Broke <S%G2806><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Five Thousand, <S%G4000><s%> How Many <S%G4214><s%> Hand Baskets <S%G2894><s%> Full <S%G4134><s%> Of Fragments <S%G2801><s%> Took Ye Up? <S%G142><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

<S%G3753><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four Thousand, <S%G5070><s%> Of How Many <S%G4214><s%> Baskets The <S%G4711><s%> Fillings <S%G4138><s%> Of Fragments <S%G2801><s%> Took Ye Up? <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Do Ye Understand? <S%G4920><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Comes <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Bethsaida; <S%G966><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Bring <S%G5342><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Blind Man, <S%G5185><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beseech <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Might Touch. <S%G680><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Taking Hold Of <S%G1949><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Blind Man <S%G5185><s%> He Led Forth <S%G1806><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Out <S%G1854><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Village, <S%G2968><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Spit <S%G4429><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3659><s%> His Eyes, <S%G846><s%> Having Laid His <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Upon Him <S%G846><s%> He Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> He Beholds. <S%G991><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Looked Up <S%G308><s%> He Said, <S%G3004><s%> I Behold <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Trees <S%G1186><s%> I See Them <S%G3708><s%> Walking. <S%G4043><s%>

Then <S%G1534><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> He Laid His <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> His Eyes, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Look Up. <S%G308><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Restored, <S%G600><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Looked On <S%G1689><s%> Clearly <S%G5081><s%> All Men. <S%G537><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Sent <S%G649><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> His House, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Neither <S%G3366><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Village <S%G2968><s%> Mayest Thou Enter, <S%G1525><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Mayest Tell It <S%G2036><s%> To Any One <S%G5100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Village. <S%G2968><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Villages <S%G2968><s%> Of Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philippi. <S%G5376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> He Was Questioning <S%G1905><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> , To Them, <S%G846><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Do Pronounce <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> To Be? <S%G1511><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> , Answered, <S%G611><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptist; <S%G910><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Others, <S%G243><s%> Elijah; <S%G2243><s%> <S%G243><s%> But Others, <S%G1161><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of The Prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye, <S%G1161><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Do Ye Pronounce <S%G3004><s%> To Be? <S%G1511><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G4771><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> He Strictly Charged <S%G2008><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> They Should Tell <S%G3004><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> To Teach <S%G1321><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> It Is Necessary For <S%G1163><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> To Suffer, <S%G3958><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Rejected <S%G593><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Killed, <S%G615><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> To Rise Again. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Openly <S%G3954><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> He Spoke. <S%G2980><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken To Him <S%G4355><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Rebuke <S%G2008><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He, <S%G1161><s%> Turning <S%G1994><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Get <S%G5217><s%> Behind <S%G3694><s%> Me, <S%G3450><s%> Satan, <S%G4567><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thy Thoughts Are Not Of <S%G5426><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> But <S%G235><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His <S%G846><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Whosoever <S%G3748><s%> Desires <S%G2309><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Me <S%G3450><s%> , To Come, <S%G2064><s%> Let Him Deny <S%G533><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Him Take Up <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4716><s%> His Cross, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Him Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Desire <S%G2309><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> To Save, <S%G4982><s%> Shall Lose <S%G622><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Lose <S%G622><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1752><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings, <S%G2098><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Shall Save <S%G4982><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> For What <S%G1063><s%> Shall It Profit <S%G5623><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> He Gain <S%G2770><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lose <S%G2210><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Soul? <S%G846><s%>
